Articles.Content:
I hope you haven't forgotten me!

Very good to see you all!

-MedwedianPresident
Why is there no more RP Forum???!!!

How was this? Was this a gigantic spam flood? Someone got banned?

And then it was closed......

Is there now ABSOLUTELY NO MORE ROLEPLAYING RULE STRICTLY SUPERVISED BY MODS?
Oh sweet sassy molassy. Everyone get to the bunker!

How was this? Was this a gigantic spam flood? Someone got banned?

And then it was closed......

Is there now ABSOLUTELY NO MORE ROLEPLAYING RULE STRICTLY SUPERVISED BY MODS?

As I remember the tread got too big and killed the server. And no role playing at the moment maybe in the future but I have no knowledge on this.
Welcome back. When did you leave? You'll be happy to know that we're getting a bunch of new planets and moons next update.
I did leave because someone accidentally permabanned me. So I was unable to acess the forum. But it's okay now, the main good thing is that I am back!
